***Solely for products which might be used for children under 3 years of age and which remain in prolonged contact with the skin.

maximum_concentration:
The use of o-phenylphenol as a preservative should be allowed with a maximum concentration of 0,15 % (as phenol) in leave-on and 0,2 % (as phenol) in rinse-off cosmetic products.
Contact with eyes should be avoided.
The use of sodium o-phenylphenate, potassium o-phenylphenate and MEA o-phenylphenate as preservatives should not be allowed.
